title: Episode 28: Delivery Complete
text: 1. [SECURE] Robot picks up venus-sand-sample in pod at hall-b
2. Robot moves with venus-sand-sample in pod: hall-b -> maintenance-tunnel
3. Robot moves with venus-sand-sample in pod: maintenance-tunnel -> hall-a
4. UNLOAD venus-sand-sample from pod at hall-a
• Action Result: UNLOAD venus-sand-sample from pod at hall-a
